We(Paul) should have the characteristics [that God gives to us(Paul)]. Then we(Paul) will be like soldiers [who wear special clothes]. A soldier wears metal [that covers the soldier's chest]. We(Paul) should trust in God. And we(Paul) should love God. And we(Paul) should love each-other(Paul).  [When we(Paul) trust in God] God protects us(Paul) [just like that metal protects that soldier]. A soldier wears a hard hat on that soldier's head. We(Paul) should hope [that God will protect us(Paul)]. Then God will protect us(Paul) from bad things and death [just like that hard hat protects that soldier from death].
